1581710.name: S2ENGINE HD - Military Base Pack
1581710.description:
Jump into modern war action in this Battlefield inspired pack for creating your own military base!
High Quality models and textures, plus some cool post processing colorization make this pack recreating the atmosphere of the best shooters on the market.

Following is the list of models you will find into this pack (with a lot of variants):
  • Military Crates
  • Military Sandbags
  • Military Barricades
  • Military Hesco-Blocks
  • Military Barriers
  • Military Fences/Walls
  • Military Barrels
  • Military Containers
  • Military Tents
  • Military Beds
  • Military Watchtowers
  • Military Hangar
  • Military RadioTower
  • Military Outpost Building

In addition to the models we have added:
  • A special Post processing FX file for giving the Battlefield / COD mood to your creations.
  • New textures for desertic terrain.
  • New road texture and material.
  • A Military Base scene as an example about what can be done with the content of this package.
  • New GameMachine to procedurally open and close crates and containers.


Enjoy!
